original_title: GL, Dilan Rally Behind Sajith as Common Candidate
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Freedom People's Congress (FPC) threw its weight behind Sajith Premadasa, formally endorsing him as the common candidate for the upcoming Presidential election.
He speaking at a press conference held at the Opposition Leader's Office in Colombo.
Dilan Perera, MP for the FPC, delivered a strong message, stated that  "The Freedom People's Congress stands united in our commitment to work alongside the Samagi Jana Balavegaya (SJB)."

Perera's declaration echoes the sentiments shared by other prominent opposition voices. G. L. Peiris, MP for the FPC, highlighted the dire situation facing the people, stating, "The people are struggling to survive. They are becoming living skeletons. We need a common platform, a broader program in 2024 to protect the people, along with the main opposition party, the Samagi Jana Balavegaya."

Shan Wijayalal De Silva, another key opposition figure, echoed the call for unity. "We need to change this existing system and introduce a more people-friendly administration," he declared. "We must align ourselves with the most powerful opposition bloc. That is why we decided to engage in this common program with the SJB."
